para.text: The Mayor may only consider TANF applicants or TANF recipients for consideration for POWER eligibility.

The Mayor may refer a TANF applicant or recipient for consideration of POWER eligibility at any time, including when a TANF applicant or recipient claims a medical incapacity exemption from work activities.

annotations.annotation: as added Apr. 20, 1999, D.C. Law 12-241, § 4(g), 46 DCR 905
For temporary (225 day) addition of section, see § 4(h) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).
This section is referenced in § 4-205.19m and § 4-205.72.
